headline: Is Lam Research (LRCX) Still Attractive After A 153% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Lam Research is still good value after its strong run, you will want to look past the headlines and focus on what the current price really implies. The stock last closed at US$194.76, with returns of 12.1% over 7 days, 22.7% over 30 days, 5.2% year to date and 153.5% over the past year, so many holders are already sitting on sizeable gains. Recent attention on semiconductor equipment makers like Lam Research has been closely linked to market interest...
